name: ☢ Your Creation ☢ (3 Days Game Challenge)
description:
INFO

this is a top down shooter game where you have to survive as much as possible to your lab this is a 3 days game challenge that i did to myself to improve my skills on unity and get used to it, so have fun and enjoy the game! ^^

CONTROLS

W,A,S,D to move

Move your mouse to aim and shoot

E & R to switch weapons

Press ESC to exit this menu
